column4: Predicts the position of the next dangerous monster before returning into the card deck.
Reveal the effect of all potion for 5 gold.

A witch casts a spell on you! Roll a dice : 
1 ) Inflict 2 point of life
2 ) Set your Strength to 1 for 5 card
3 ) Do nothing
4 ) Do nothing
5 ) Add 2 point of Strength
6 ) Heal 2 point of Life
